misuse: CWE-757: Selection of Less-Secure Algorithm During Negotiation
description: The code uses AES/GCM/NoPadding which does not include authentication tag length. It is recommended to use AES/GCM/ with a specific authentication tag length to ensure data integrity and security.
recommendation: Use AES/GCM algorithm with a specific authentication tag length, such as AES/GCM/12
